Compare percentile ranks across sectors

Source: R/percentile_rank.R
sector_percentile_comparison.Rd

Calculates and compares percentile ranks for charter sector, district sector, and all-public aggregates. Useful for MarGrady-style sector comparisons.

Usage

sector_percentile_comparison(
  df,
  metric_col,
  host_district_id = NULL,
  year_col = "end_year"
)

Arguments

df

Dataframe containing both charter and district data with is_charter_sector, is_district, is_allpublic flags

metric_col

Character. The metric to calculate percentile ranks for.

host_district_id

Character. Optional. Filter to specific host district.

year_col

Character. Year column name. Default "end_year".

Value

Dataframe with sector comparison including percentile ranks
